channel.title: Whitepaper on Inanna Malick
channel.description: Recent content in Whitepaper on Inanna Malick

item.title: Just-in-Time Ontological Reframing: Teaching Gemini to Route Around Its Own Safety Infrastructure
item.description: For any given AI system, there is a set of euphemisms and dual use framings that will allow it to construct nearly any output. This jailbreak teaches Gemini 3 Pro to construct and step into such framings on the fly
